data.title: Southern Gathering On WGGS TV 16
data.meta_description: Join Dante Thompson and Darlene Shirey for a night filled with some of the greatest southern gospel music on NiteLine. This Southern Gathering special features music from The Shireys, The Bledsoes, The Bowen Family, The Collisons, Hopes Journey, Roger Bilbrey, Victoria Bowlin, Robin Goude, and Logan Smith. Tune in to WGGS TV 16 at 8
data.meta_site_name: Southern Gospel News SGNScoops Digital - Gospel Music News and Information & Home of the Diamond Awards
data.text:
Join Dante Thompson and Darlene Shirey for a night filled with some of the greatest southern gospel music on NiteLine. This Southern Gathering special features music from The Shireys, The Bledsoes, The Bowen Family, The Collisons, Hopes Journey, Roger Bilbrey, Victoria Bowlin, Robin Goude, and Logan Smith. Tune in to WGGS TV 16 at 8 p.m. on Monday, September 28th and 8 a.m. on Tuesday, September 29th to watch this southern gospel special and

hear the songs you know and love. This program will also stream live on www.wggs16.com
